body.string: {"model":"claude-3-5-sonnet-20240620","max_tokens":128,"temperature":0.0,"system":"You are a helpfull assistant who answers questions succinctly.","messages":[{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"What is the current weather?"}]},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"tool_use","id":"call_RX1D4jUDUrfi4AePr4ZP7Sqv","name":"get_location","input":{}}]},{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"tool_result","tool_use_id":"call_RX1D4jUDUrfi4AePr4ZP7Sqv","content":"Seattle, WA, USA"}]}],"tools":[{"name":"get_location","description":"The get_location tool will return the users city, state or province and country.","input_schema":{"type":"object"}},{"name":"get_weather","description":"The get_weather tool will return the current weather in a given locality.","input_schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"location":{"type":"object","description":"The locality for which the weather will be returned","properties":{"city":{"type":"string","description":"The city or town for which the current weather should be returned."},"state":{"type":"string","description":"The state or province for which the current weather should be returned.
